entry.body:
import Details from "@w/Details.astro";
import TabMenu from "@w/TabMenu.astro";
import TabData from "@w/TabData.astro";
import N from "@n/N.astro";
import MDXLayer from "@l/MDXLayer.astro";
import Widget from "@w/Widget.astro";
import MDXJS from "@w/MDXJS.astro";

<MDXLayer title={frontmatter.title} description={frontmatter.description}>
<Widget img={frontmatter.img} skeleton={false}>
<MDXJS>


<TabMenu first="general" data={["guides","media", "notes"]}>
<TabData tail="block" data="general">

## Information

## Install

## Plugins

Plugin Requirement:
[mdx-as-md-obsidian](https://publish.obsidian.md/hub/02+-+Community+Expansions/02.05+All+Community+Expansions/Plugins/mdx-as-md-obsidian)

</TabData>
<TabData data="guides">

## Guides

Our list of guides that make it easier to use Obsidian. 

### Daily Notes

A quick guide, [Daily Notes by DannB.org](https://dannb.org/blog/2022/obsidian-daily-note-template/), on setting up daily notes for the KBVE Vault. 
We did not yet add the templating system because we are still having some MDX errors. 

</TabData>

<TabData data="media">

## Media

</TabData>

<TabData data="notes">

## Log

- [ ] ~Create `Concept` Issue Ticket~
- [ ] ~Obsidian - init - Start the initialization of Obsidian~
- [ ] Map out the integration of Obsidian and AstroJS

</TabData>

</TabMenu>


</MDXJS>
</Widget>
</MDXLayer>

data.title: Obsidian
data.description: A knowledge base application that helps organize notes in a markdown style format.
data.author: KBVE Team
